definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: We feasted for weeks on the deer that daddy shot.
sentences.chinese: 我們接連數週飽餐了父親獵得的鹿肉。

sentences.english: We must show all honours to the ambassadors of Caesar.
sentences.chinese: 對凱撒的使臣，我們可要禮數週全。

sentences.english: A couple of weeks ago, I saw a 5-year-old girl who was still wetting the bed every night.
sentences.chinese: 數週前，我診治了一個五歲了還每晚尿牀的小女孩。

sentences.english: Favreau then went away and spent weeks on research.
sentences.chinese: 隨後法弗洛花了數週來研究如何寫稿。

sentences.english: Having one of those days or weeks when everything seems to annoy you?
sentences.chinese: 有的這些天或數週當一切似乎煩擾你一個嗎？

sentences.english: Brady said he would reflect on what the future might hold in the coming weeks.
sentences.chinese: 布蘭迪說未來數週以後，不管怎樣，他都會接受結果。

sentences.english: After flirting with it for weeks, Greek debt was finally given a junk rating.
sentences.chinese: 經過數週的眉來眼去，希臘債務最終被定爲垃圾級。

sentences.english: Made from cellulose, this shrink-wrap decomposes in a few weeks in a compost rubbish or in an industrial composter .
sentences.chinese: 由纖維素，這拆封分解在數週或垃圾堆肥在工業堆肥。

sentences.english: Prodromal stage can count day to reach several weeks continuously.
sentences.chinese: 前驅期可持續數日至數週。

sentences.english: If you find something suspicious, will you be posting things yourself as the weeks go on?
sentences.chinese: 如果你發現可疑之處，會數週數週的記錄嗎？

sentences.english: If you find something suspicious, will you be posting things yourself as the weeks go on?
sentences.chinese: 如果你發現可疑之處，會數週數週的記錄嗎？

sentences.english: My administration has been setting out our environmental programme vigorously in the weeks since then.
sentences.chinese: 在隨後的數週內，政府大力推展環保計劃。

sentences.english: This is several weeks old and therefore the price is not in line with toady's market.
sentences.chinese: 既然此表已過時數週，其價格亦可能不適於當今市場。

sentences.english: Weiler expects papers to appear in a matter of days or weeks.
sentences.chinese: 維勒預計出現新的論文僅是數天或數週裏的事情。

sentences.english: We need biodegradable products that if dumped, will simply disintegrate within a few weeks.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要可以在丟棄後數週內即被生物降解的材料。

sentences.english: The residents of the Hankou Binjiang estate had been moved out weeks before.
sentences.chinese: 漢口濱江的居民數週前就已將財產轉移。

definition: loud songs reaches the clouds (idiom); fig. to praise to the skies
to take turns/to work by roster
to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide
industrial relations/relations between labor and capital
to turn white-hot/to intensify/to reach a climax
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
